General.Name: Qingdao Kingking Applied Chemistry Co Ltd
General.Description: Qingdao Kingking Applied Chemistry Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of cosmetics and scented candles in China and internationally. The company provides cosmetics products under the ALLL Beauty brand. It sells through online channel. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Qingdao, China.

2.Name: Mr. Xin Qiang  Du
2.Title: VP, Sec. of the Board & Director
